name: Plxyer
description: What is the project about? PLXYER (pronounced as Player) is a web3 distribution platform for blockchain games with its all-in-one platform for Web3 developers and players. The Platform integrates traditional and on-chain gaming, turnkey game creation tools, DAO governance, a guild management portal, and an NFT marketplace with various P2P services. What makes your project unique? The platform provides game creators with the tools and resources for launching and managing Web3 games while offering players the good gaming experience. History of your project. The project was founded in 2023 and was listed on BitMart on 16th June 2023. Whatâ€™s next for your project? The Game portal for the project will be launched by the end of 2023 and other features such as NFT Marketplace, Tournaments DAO governance will be launched next year.
